title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/nprogress
author: oeyoews
name: nprogress
readme:
> nprogress tiddlywiki 版本

```js
$tw.NProgress.start()
$tw.NProgress.done()

// widget
this.parentWidget.dispatchEvent({
	type: 'om-nprogress',
});
```

```html
<$button message="om-nprogress">
start
</$button >

<$button >
<$action-sendmessage $message="om-nprogress" type="start" />
start
</$button>
```
